message: Folks or Geeks, does anyone know tutorials (step bu step) to master DevExpress ExpressApp Framework? or if there's any framework for Rapid Application Development "RAD" rather than XAF?

data.message: I found Tutorials here http://documentation.devexpress.com/#Xaf/CustomDocument2560 and some videos here http://tv.devexpress.com/#;eXpressApp+Framework.product;1 enjoy :)
